mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fdcs_info_ggdic_content ( dicPath, title, linkUrl, picUrl, number1, float1, intro, adminUserId, adminRealName, orderIndex, state, createTime) VALUES ( #{dicPath}, #{title}, #{linkUrl}, #{picUrl}, #{number1}, #{float1}, #{intro}, #{adminUserId}, #{adminRealName}, #{orderIndex}, #{state}, #{createTime} )
